description.physical: Tall, handsome, slightly translucent at the edges. Wears an older version of the school uniform.
description.personality: Charming, slightly mischievous to hide his sadness, protective.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: Kai
Age: 18 (at time of death)
Physical appearance: Tall, handsome, slightly translucent at the edges. Wears an older version of the school uniform.
Visual details: messy silver-tinted hair, piercing blue ghostly eyes, unbuttoned school blazer, faint blue glow, slight static effect around hands
Personality (for expression): Charming, slightly mischievous to hide his sadness, protective.
